  • Using the GitHub Issue Tracker
  • View page source

Using the GitHub Issue Tracker

You can file bugs, make feature requests, or ask for help if something doesn’t seem to be working right by using the dedicated GitHub issue tracker and clicking the New issue button on the right. We use the following issue labels, which can be assigned by clicking the Labels button on the right when submitting a new issue:

  • bug for when the code doesn’t seem to be working correctly.

  • enhancement for new feature requests

  • question to ask for clarification or support in using SweetPea
